text: Dark Emissaries forces at the Mainland!
Dark forces prepare to ravage our Capital! They seek to use its power for their own dark and twisted purposes.
Dark Emissary forces to the North!
Dark forces muster to the north! Prepare the defenses, we shall beat them back from the Citadel! We will never fall to their dark and twisted plans.
Dark Emissary forces to the South!
Dark forces sighted on the southern shores! Their lay their greedy eyes on the Isle of Wights!
